Package javelin.model.transport

Class Transport

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.transport.Transport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Airship, Carriage, Ship
    public class Transport
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Vehicles improve speed / random encounter chance.
    See Also:
    Squad.transport, Serialized Form

      • keep

        public void keep​(Squad s)
        Pays the maintenance upkeep and destroys the transport otherwise. Will also sink with tripulation that can't swim.
        See Also:
        Squad.transport

      • park

        public void park()
        Throws:
        RepeatTurn - If can't park - with a message explaining why.
